name: Advice generator app
intro: Small project that is using Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

title: About the project
paragraph: Design for this project is coming from Frontend Mentor website. Simple project that is fethcing the data from the API and passing the response to the component. Website is responsive and with accessibility in mind.

title: Starter files
paragraph: In starter files we have basic _reset.scss file that is taking care of box-sizing, html and body heights and removing some of the default browser styles. In the _variables.scss we have CSS variables for colors, border-radius font and general sizes.

title: Card component
paragraph: This project has only one component, which is a Card.js component located in components folder. Data that is displayed inside the component is being fetched in index.js page and the API response is passed as prop to the Card component.

name: HeyDusan
description: HeyDusan is first version of my portfolio webside that is created with HTML/CSS and little bit of JS. Website is fast and reponsive with perfect score on Lighthouse.
